Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that Friday May 12th is Lamp Day so buy a lamp for Women's Service in war time. Poster also sugests helping to sell the lamps. Illustration shows a lantern.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
